text: The Toyota Comfort is an automobile that was designed by Toyota. The Toyota Comfort was made from 1995 until 2017 by Kanto Auto Works. The Toyota Comfort, was mainly used as a taxi, in Japan, Singapore, and Hong Kong. Sometimes the Toyota Comfort could fit five people in it, six with the driver. When Toyota stopped making the Toyota Comfort in 2017, Toyota made the Toyota JPN-Taxi instead. == References == Comfort Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:Sedans
title: Toyota Comfort
